display_long_description:
**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!
[media]
# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
[media]
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
[media]
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
[media]
# Two Environments Included and Counting!
[media]
# Health and Safety Warning
All users must refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of injury or harm when walking the virtual plank.

**Your next gen plank walking simulator**, set high up in New York City, designed to maximize the Quest hardware, at the introductory price of just $5.99 (USD). It's the perfect experience to show off your new headset!

# The Ultimate Welcome To VR
Bring friends and family together for great laughs as everyone’s knees go weak on a thin plank atop the One Astor Plaza skyscraper!
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75300188_1355526652351506_2178293079657922896_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=TBOa5F1W08MQ7kNvwH6Rfz5&_nc_oc=Adnbxsk9zUPq3Ck1_O6IPiT9rrPgSpJQbHeAvum9L32-ojiR7tSPEVw7SGBqmfnSNjA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zHqxsJ5w5v8FgrQjjt6V8g&oh=00_AfJ8qtve5tNkrgVoD-zgK0Qsf2bly6_nnyH3BT8BbLhD6A&oe=68468324)
# Next Gen Realism
We set out to push the limits of what the most realistic plank simulator could be on next gen Quest hardware.
![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031656_569899209002816_7347204436020726564_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=LHJGAaT21n4Q7kNvwGHxvy2&_nc_oc=AdlL-PfYkB8zC6a4QGtk-3gu3iY1wuoLXgEcU-seNSZuHa3GG1pmKYax6x4A0zQ-wJY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zHqxsJ5w5v8FgrQjjt6V8g&oh=00_AfIQ1TnjMHuy1Gj73VvH3xfkgD5a2lNkL8pW1_XuTi4tUw&oe=6846A272)
# Plank Variety
6 plank variations including: Wood Plank, Glass Plank, Metal Grate, The Pole, Red Light Green Light and Roulette. More to come!
